spells.description: Summons an object towards the caster.
spells.name: Accio

spells.description: Produces a clean, drinkable jet of water from the wand tip.
spells.name: Aguamenti

spells.description: The Unlocking Charm (Alohomora), also known as the Thief’s Friend is a charm that unlocks the target, including doors, windows or other objects.
spells.name: Alohomora

spells.description: Also known as the Slowing Charm. Slows down the velocity of an object.
spells.name: Arresto Momentum

spells.description: Also known as the Exploding Charm. Detonates the target in a small explosion. Used for opening sealed doors and window bars.
spells.name: Bombarda

spells.description: The Severing Charm, which can be used to cut absolutely anything
spells.name: Diffindo

spells.description: Entraps the targeted individual, or indeed any target, in a very large bubble that cannot be popped by physical force.
spells.name: Ebublio

spells.description: A difficult spell, and the only known defence against Dementors
spells.name: Expecto Patronum

spells.description: Finite Incantatem is a spell that causes easier ongoing spells and jinxes to stop.
spells.name: Finite

spells.description: A jinx that knocks back the target back
spells.name: Flipendo

spells.description: Meteolojinx Recanto is the incantation to a counter-charm that presumably causes weather effects caused by Weather-Modifying Charms.
spells.name: Meteolojinx Recanto

spells.description: A spell used when fighting a Boggart, “Riddikulus” forces the Boggart to take the appearance of an object the caster is focusing on.
spells.name: Riddikkulus
